Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Manuel Espinosa Jr
Reviews.Content: This package is an excellent value. The batteries and charger work properly. The extras in the kit come in handy. The lens cleaning solution leaked a little in the bag, but nothing serious. The kit was received on time as advertised. I'm  very satisfied.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1200 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Memory Card Wallet + USB 50 in 1 SDHC Card Reader
Mini Table Top Tripod + Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
(See Description for MORE!)
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1200 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement BP-70A Battery and Charger Kit + Memory Card Wallet + Multi Card USB Reader + Deluxe Starter Kit for Samsung ES91 Digital Camera and Samsung BP-70A
